description: Approval of details application for the full discharge of conditions 11 (Photovoltaic Cells), 26 (Refuse/Recycling), 32 (Secure by Design) and 37 (Platform Lifts to Existing Blocks) as well as the partial discharge for phase 1.1 of conditions 6 (Construction Environmental Management Plan), 14 (Drainage and SUDS), 27 (Cycle Parking), and 38 (Fire Statement) of planning permission P2017/2065/FUL dated 21/06/2018.
decision_conditions: You are advised that this decision notice grants approval of details pursuant to conditions 6, 14, 27, and 38 for phase 1.1 of the development outlined in planning permission reference P2017/2065/FUL only. You are advised that, for future phases, you should submit details for the discharge of these conditions again.

application_details.lead_developer_company_name: London Fire & Emergency Planning Authority  (all majors)
